name: Circuit Defense (itch)
description:
Circuit Defense is a 1 Player Strategy Game where you must defend your Computer's Motherboard from hordes of incoming Viruses. Survive as long as you can!

Use Left Click to Select and Place Turrets.

Use Spacebar to call in Enemy Waves.

-----------------------------------------------

Writing and Design - Ryan Pratt

Programming - David Marshall

Art - Ryan Normand

-----------------------------------------------

Comment the highest Wave you got to!
